Lungiswa Gqunta (a mụrụ n'afọ 1990) bụ onye South Africa na-akpụ ihe na onye na-ese ihe. E gosipụtala ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ngosi na ihe ngosi tinyekwara Zeitz Museum of Contemporary Art Africa, Johannesburg Art Gallery, Kunsthal Zurich na Nelson Mandela Metropolitan University, University of Cape Town
A mụrụ Gqunta n'afọ 1990 na Port Elizabeth, South Africa. Ọ gara Nelson Mandela Metropolitan University ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 2012 na nzere bachelọ
N'afọ 2017, ọ natara MFA na Michaelis School of Fine Arts na Cape Town

Gqunta bụ onye guzobere iQhiya Collective, netwọk nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii na-eto eto na-ese ihe na Cape Town na Johannesburg, South Africa. Ọrụ ya na-enyocha ala ndị ọchịchị na ihe nketa mbara igwe nke sitere na ha

Ọ na-eji ihe ndị a chọtara tinyekwara karama biya efu, mmanụ ụgbọala, akwa àkwà dọwara adọwa na akwa àkwà osisi na-eyi iji mepụta atụmatụ nke na-egosipụta ụdị ime ihe ike dị iche iche na enweghị nhata na South Africa. O gosipụtala ọrụ ya na ọtụtụ ụlọ ngosi na South Africa gụnyere Zeitz Museum of Contemporary Art Africa na Johannesburg Art Gallery (JAG).
O gosipụtala ọrụ ya na mpaghara na mba ụwa
Ọtutu n'ime ihe ngosi nke naanị ya na nke otu o sonyere gụnyere:
Gqunta bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Cape Town.
